Blot gets knocked over and yells.

Blot: No! Blot is badder than bad in mad=
 control now!

Blot tries to slash Cutthroat...

  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
  From: LurkerAbyss 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday,=
 May 09, 2001 9:43 PM
  Subject: Re: Two More Decepticons to Deal With/Gala=
ctor Jets


  ::Cutthroat::
   
      The 4 shots hit Cutthroat, and he fel=
l down butt-first.
    
     "No, I'm madder than you!" Cutthroat "correcte=
d."
   
      Cutthroat ran at Blot, and tried to tackle him down to the gr=
ound.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Soulstice Omega 
    To: =
nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, May 09, 2001 7:23 PM
    Subje=
ct: Re: Two More Decepticons to Deal With/Galactor Jets


    The shots ban=
ged against Blot's head, knocking him a bit dizzy.

    Blot: GRAAAA! Blot =
be soooooo madder than you are!

    Blot fired each of his blasters (He ha=
s 2) twice at Cutthroat...

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From:=
 LurkerAbyss 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, May =
09, 2001 3:33 PM
      Subject: Re: Two More Decepticons to Deal With/Galac=
tor Jets


      ::Cutthroat::
       
      Cutthroat: Now you fight too? =
 Harr, die!
       
      Cutthroat did a 180 degree spin to the side, and =
the shot missed him.  Then, he took his gun and fired 3 shots at Blot.
    =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Soulstice Omega 
        To=
: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, May 08, 2001 10:30 PM
    =
    Subject: Re: Two More Decepticons to Deal With/Galactor Jets


        =
OOC: 4 shits? Hehehe.

        BIC: Blot: Blot be maaaad! No fightsing!

  =
      Blot fires his slime gun at Cutthroat...

          ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
          From: LurkerAbyss 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
          Sent: Tuesday, May 08, 2001 9:48 PM
          Subject: Re: T=
wo More Decepticons to Deal With/Galactor Jets


          ::Cutthroat::
  =
         
                Cutthroat, being a copycat, and not wanting to lo=
se an advantage, also transformed to robot mode.  He stood still, and the 4=
 shits hit him in the chest.  He looked a little dumbfounded for a moment, =
then whipped out his gun and shot 4 shots back at Hun-Grr.
           
    =
      OOC: Ok, I just said gun 'cause I don't know what weapons Cutthroat h=
as in robot mode.
